message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $130. It's a great deal for you, as it's worth $150 to you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go above $120 for the product. Looking forward to your response!
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $120 is just too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $125.  Let's meet in the middle on this one.
